description: Hosted by Chris Burns and Love Is Blind's Lauren Speed-Hamilton, We Have the Receipts is a weekly all-access deep dive into Netflix Unscripted Reality! Each episode will bring you closer to the people behind the reality, with the free-flowing depth of podcast conversations and viral elements of TV’s best talk shows, We Have The Receipts is an upbeat, fan-first destination to uncover more insider secrets, more expert hot takes, and more off-the-rails drama from their favorite Netflix reality stars.

items.content: Another day, another season of Orange County mess for us to sink our teeth into. But don't take Chris and Lauren's word for it, Brandi and Kayla are ready to set the record straight and spill all the tea on what went down this season of Selling the OC!

The time has come: Love is Blind is BACK with cringe-worthy serenades, accidental naps, and more drama than ever. Listen as Chris and Lauren break down all of their favorite (and not-so-favorite) moments of episodes 1-5.
PLUS they sit down with our lovable mean girl Irina to discuss what it was like to fall in and out of love with Zack.

items.content:
It's the final episode of the year ya'll! On this final episode of 2022, Chris and Lauren take a look back at the some of their fave moments from We Have The Receipts including Chris showing his NYC apartment to the Selling Sunset ladies, an afterparty conversation with Adam DiVello, and Lauren learning learning she can no longer say "clutching pearls" without giggling. Then they are joined by two fans for some fun Netflix reality trivia, and finally they wrap with a look at what's to come in 2023! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Check out the episodes mentioned in today's episode:Nick & Vanessa LacheyAdam DiVelloSelling SunsetMelanie RoseKyle and Deepti

Lauren Speed-Hamilton - @needforlspeedChris Burns - @fatcarriebradshaw
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
items.content:encoded:
It's the final episode of the year ya'll! On this final episode of 2022, Chris and Lauren take a look back at the some of their fave moments from We Have The Receipts including Chris showing his NYC apartment to the Selling Sunset ladies, an afterparty conversation with Adam DiVello, and Lauren learning learning she can no longer say "clutching pearls" without giggling. Then they are joined by two fans for some fun Netflix reality trivia, and finally they wrap with a look at what's to come in 2023! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Check out the episodes mentioned in today's episode:
Nick & Vanessa Lachey
Adam DiVello
Selling Sunset
Melanie Rose
Kyle and Deepti

Lauren Speed-Hamilton - @needforlspeed

Chris Burns - @fatcarriebradshaw

items.content:
On this episode, Chris and Lauren dig into some more drama-filled realty reality with Buying Beverly Hills, covering the full season and all of the stunning luxury real estate. The two then sit down with the eldest of the Umansky daughters, senior agent, Farrah Aldjufrie. Farrah shares about having been introduced to the world as the daughter of Kyle Richards on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, how she's been forging her own path, what it's really like to work with family, and whether or not she's made any wedding plans. It's a conversation you won't want to miss!

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Lauren Speed-Hamilton - @needforlspeedChris Burns - @fatcarriebradshawFarrah Aldjufire - @farrahbritt

items.content:
Get ready for a 3-for-1 special today! On this episode, Chris and Lauren cover three of the most fun shows to watch right now. First, they sit down with the host of Easy Bake Battle, Queer Eye's Antoni Porowski. Antoni talks about his drive to make cooking accessible, what he would cook to make the best impression, and his new fave hacks from Easy Bake Battle. Next, Chris and Lauren sit with contestants and mixologists, LP and Kate from Drinkmasters, along with the shows host, Tone Bell. The group talks about their fave drinks (to drink and make), and what NOT to order at a bar, and then put their guests to the test with a boozy taste-test game. Finally, Chris and Lauren sit with the delightful Fortune Feimster to discuss her new special Good Fortune and some of her best- and worst- stand-up moments. 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Lauren Speed-Hamilton - @needforlspeedChris Burns - @fatcarriebradshaw
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

items.content:
Love is Blind is back and Chris and Lauren can’t wait to dive into season 3 and it’s cooky cast of characters! Together they break down the couples who make it out of the pods engaged, the rejections and tears (…or fake tears…), as well as answer a few fan voicemails. Then they welcome the Love Is Blind ultimate power couple, aka LIB Mom and Dad, Nick and Vanessa Lachey. The Lacheys share what it’s been like to host all three seasons, who their favorites are, and how they continue to put in the work for their marriage. You won’t want to miss this interview with a cameo from your favorite LIB husband, Cameron.

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Vanessa Lachey - https://www.instagram.com/vanessalachey/

items.content:
Chris and Lauren are here to recap the reboot of the 2001 classic ultra-competition show, The Mole. On this show, a group of fourteen strangers undertake an array of physical and mental challenges. Together our hosts cover each episode, all the shady strategic moves, and make their predictions as they move through each challenge. Chris and Lauren are then joined by fan favorite Dom Gabriel. Dom discusses his time on the show, who he knew for sure wasn’t The Mole, who had him fooled, and why being Canadian was an added challenge. Chris and Lauren then finish their recap, leaving us with their predictions of who might be The Mole. Hint: it could be Chris!

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Bling Empire is back with a vengeance! Your favorite blinged out cast members are back for season 3 and do not skip a beat. Chris and Lauren recap the drama-filled season, diving into the Christine and Anna drama, Kane's propensity for creating drama, and Kevin's search for his biological parents. Then, the hosts sit down for exclusive interviews with Anna, Christine, Kane and Kelly, to discuss the current state of their relationships, how they felt watching some of the key scenes back, and lots more. Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. items.content:
Interior designers Eilyn and Ray Jimenez are making South Florida chicer one luxury  house at a time—as the owners of competing companies. The married stars of Netflix's 'Designing Miami' sit down with Chris and Lauren to spill on how they find balance between their personal lives and work rivalry. We find out who the head designer is when it comes to their household, the most over-the-top client demand Eilyn's ever met, and whether it's perfect lighting or perfect furniture that matters more.

WORK_OF_ART: Love Is Blind: After the Altar

items.content:
It's been seven *long* months since we got to see which Love Is Blind season 2 couples said "I do" and which ones didn't make it past the altar. Thankfully Love Is Blind: After the Altar is here and it's time for a much-needed post-show update! Deepti Vempati and Kyle Abrams join us to spill on Sal's new girlfriend, Shake's absence from the reunion, and we grill them on where their relationship stands because we need those receipts okurrr! Kyle doesn't hold back on how he feels about Natalie or his former fiancé Shaina and her new husband. Love may or may not be blind but it is most definitely brutal y'all! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.content:
On the surface, Dated and Related is very similar to other dating shows, with a group of young, hot singles looking for love. There's just one key difference – some of them are related. Is this the most awkward dating show in history?! Today Chris and Lauren are joined by contestants Kaz Bishop, Diana Parsijanis, Kieran Bishop, and Alara Taneri, to find out what it took to succeed this super cringey scenario and, of course, if anyone really did bathe with their brother. 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.content:encodedSnippet:
On the surface, Dated and Related is very similar to other dating shows, with a group of young, hot singles looking for love. There's just one key difference – some of them are related. Is this the most awkward dating show in history?! Today Chris and Lauren are joined by contestants Kaz Bishop, Diana Parsijanis, Kieran Bishop, and Alara Taneri, to find out what it took to succeed this super cringey scenario and, of course, if anyone really did bathe with their brother. 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.content:
If you have dreams of trading in real life for reality TV stardom, this one's for you. Today we're giving you an inside look at the reality casting process with some of the Netflix pros! Erin Tomasello gives us the lowdown on casting The Circle and shares three red flags that immediately make her write someone off during the audition process. Then, Rich Leist, who heads the entire Netflix in-house casting department, talks about casting the biggest reality competition series ever and discovering the next breakout star. Plus, we got our hands on some audition tapes from a few of our favorite Netflix reality stars and y'all, we are getting emotional watching these!  

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.title: Casting secrets from Netflix pros

items.content:
The Oppenheim empire has expanded to Orange County and we're here for it! Selling the OC, the newest spinoff from the Selling Sunset franchise, dropped August 24th and as expected the antics are as grand as the listings. On today's episode Chris and Lauren are sitting down with the whole cast to find out what it's like having a co-ed cast for the first time ever, who has a celeb spouse, and what it would take for everyone to get along in the new office (hint: it's a lot). Buckle up! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.title: Chris and Lauren's Fall Preview!

items.content:
Since the release of the first season, Indian Matchmaking has become somewhat of a social media phenomenon, with many attributing its success to its cringe-worthy, tell-it-like-it-is approach and tough talking aunty ﬁgure, Sima, who is at its center, which are a match made for TV. And now, there's a whole new season for us to obsess over! Today, Chris and Lauren are joined by couple Pradyhuman Maloo and Ashima Chauhaan along with fan favorite Aparna Shewakramani to talk about how opposites attract and owning your standard. Plus, we'll hear some of our listeners' matchmaking nightmares and Aparna will have to use her lawyer skills to determine which ones are true and which a lie! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Lauren Speed-Hamilton - https://www.instagram.com/need4lspeed/

items.content:
From simple fixes to major overhauls, we are living for home renovation shows lately…especially when they're part home renovation show, part heist movie! In the upcoming series Instant Dream Home (hosted by Danielle Brooks aka Taystee from Orange is the New Black, thank you very much) a group of families are in for the surprise of their lives as their homes are totally transformed in 12 LITERAL HOURS. Executive Producer Tom Forman joins Chris and Lauren to tell us how he pitched the show, how they chose eight families out of the thousands of applicants, and how they managed to pull off what seems like mission impossible time and time again! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.title: Chris and Lauren on Why You Should Watch!

items.content:
Lauren and Chris are so excited to introduce you to a favorite Netflix Reality Queen, Chloe Veitch, and her new podcast, Bangin' with Chloe Veitch. You might remember Chloe from some of the best binge-worthy shows Too Hot to Handle and The Circle and now you can hear from her every week on her new podcast.

Today, we're giving you an exclusive taste of Bangin' with Chloe's very first podcast episode, where she sits down with her best mate (and "Too Hot To Handle" castmate) Nicole O'Brien to dish about getting thrush in a foreign country and the worst dates ever. You've never seen Chloe like this!
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

items.content:
Bust out those bedazzled overalls (no, just us?!) because it’s time to do some real estate and home improvement TV binging y’all! Netflix has announced its lineup of real estate and home renovation shows for the year, including six new series that will premiere this summer and fall. To properly commemorate the occasion, Netflix hosted an event for cast members of these and other Netflix reality shows and you know we were out there getting those receipts! On today's episode Chris and Lauren are chatting with luxury interior designer Melanie Rose of “How to Build a Sex Room” which premiered Friday, July 8th. The show follows the so-called "Mary Poppins of sex rooms" as she creates stylish spaces to bring couples’ (and okay there’s one septuple - we don’t make the rules) wildest fantasies to life. Things get so spicy during this interview that it makes Lauren blush!  

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Lauren Speed-Hamilton - https://www.instagram.com/need4lspeed/

Chris Burns - https://www.instagram.com/fatcarriebradshaw/
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Fellow reality stans, this one's for you! Today we’re putting on our cute little historian hats and giving you a look at how reality TV has evolved over the years. And we’re talking to one of reality TV’s most prolific figures, Adam DiVello! Adam gives us the tea on creating some of our favorite early 2000s shows like Laguna Beach and The Hills. He spills about how Selling Sunset came to be and then helps us build the ultimate reality TV cast!

A blizzard is in the forecast today y’all! Snowflake Mountain follows a group of spoiled 20-somethings as they get they get tricked by their families into going on a survival retreat in the great outdoors to compete for a $50,000 cash prize. We have two reformed snowflakes with us today: self described "chaos queen" Deandra Joseph and Liam Brown, a so-called diva who lives by the words "I'm here for a good time, not a long time." These two were hilarious on the show and just as hilarious chatting with Chris and Lauren Bay-bee!!

items.content:
Iron Chef is back y'all! In this next-level cooking competition, five new trailblazing Iron Chefs welcome a group of brave Challenger Chefs to Kitchen Stadium, where they’ll face off and be pushed to the limits of endurance and creativity. The battle at Kitchen Stadium is fierce but Chef Esther Choi put up one hell of a fight! The most successful Challenger Chef joins Chris and Lauren to talk 'kimchifying' everything, being a boss in a male-dominated space, and what it was like facing off against all five Iron Chefs in an epic sea-themed battle. Then, get ready to brush up on your culinary and pop culture knowledge as Esther goes head to head with Chris and Lauren to find out who knows more about each other's respective area of expertise! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.content:
Ashley Hesseltine and Rayna Greenberg brilliantly combine some of the best things in the world—food, sex, and TV—in Girls Gotta Eat, a hilarious and uncensored hit podcast about dating in the modern age that snags close to 3 million downloads per month and features guests like Mary Fitzgerald from Selling Sunset and comedian Nikki Glaser who we know appeared on The Circle Season 4. They’re total reality junkies like us and always come with fresh TV recs…and well, since so many of the shows we talk about revolve around dating and finding love…there’s a lot of crossover. We figured, who better to join us for a Reality Mid-Year Review than these two badass fellow podcast queens!! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.content:
Season 1 of Love Is Blind on Netflix paved the way for a group of new hopeful singles in Season 2. But where are the Season 1 cast members now? Fans got an update during the 2021 special Love Is Blind: After the Altar, but lots has happened since then. Plus, well, you know… one of the OGs just so happens to host this show. Lauren's husband Cameron joins us for another "CAM-eo" but this time we're doing a deep dive on life with the Hamiltons! We find out what keeps this fan favorite couple's relationship going strong four years after filming and best believe we get those receipts too! 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

If you tuned into episode 11 with The Circle Season 2 winner DeLeesa Saint, you know that we are obsessed with the Circle, Netflix’s social-media-style competition series that’s basically quarantine life but a gameshow (and you also know that Chris makes a really good catfish!) Today, we’re chatting with Frank Grimsley, the winner of Season 4…but first, we’re doing a deep dive on seasons past with some of your favorite players from all three of the earlier seasons! Message: flame emoji, flame emoji, #GoodandSpicy and send.

We were obsessed with both seasons of the Australian version of Love on the Spectrum…and we’re just as obsessed with the first season of the U.S. version, which dropped May 18th! Today Autism expert Jennifer Cook joins Chris and Lauren to share about working with some of the cast on behavioral skills. Then, cast member Dani Bowman who is navigating the dating scene as a neurodiverse adult shares some important lessons she's learned and gives us the latest on her love life.

The first four episodes of the Circle Season 4 have officially dropped on Netflix! Chris is obsessed and wants to be on season 5. Lauren just so happens to be friends with DeLeesa Saint, who won season 2 catfishing as her husband Trevor, and she's joining us today to talk strategy and how to win the game! Then, we put Chris' skills to the test and see if he's able to fool the Queen of Catfish herself into thinking he's the real Lauren. This episode will have you screaming "Chris and Lauren, take me to the Circle Chat!"

items.content:
Hold on to your red-bottom heels - we're back with part two of our Selling Sunset Season 5 Extravaganza! This week, Chris and Lauren chat with Vanessa and Maya about the infamous promise ring moment, when to show your gross side in a new relationship, and navigating today's market as a first-time home buyer. If you don't know what a contingency is, join the club! Then, Davina shares how she felt during her super heated lunch date with Chelsea, Amanza finally puts those Zac Efron rumors to bed, and we find out if Heather kept those insane flowers from Christine after her bridal shower! She's on vocal rest but don't worry - we still figured out a way to get those receipts.  

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.content:
If there's anything we've learned from the ladies of Selling Sunset it's that there's no such thing as too much pink, drama and commission! To celebrate the show's Season 5 premiere, Chris and Lauren tagged along on a ’90s Barbie Dreamhouse–inspired cover shoot for Tudum to have a kiki with the ladies of The Oppenheim Group! Chelsea shares what it's been like being the newest agent, how she really got cast, and why she and Christine are the "black and blonde Barbie." Chris gives Chelsea a quick photo tour of his Brooklyn apartment and we put her real estate pricing skills to the test! Then, OG agents Chrishell, Emma and Mary dish on their relationship statuses, their humble beginnings, and what's new at the office. 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.content:
While many couples' endings were surprising on The Ultimatum: Marry Or Move On, Madlyn Ballatori and Colby Kissinger's reunion reveal takes the cake...or should we say, the baby silver goblet! The newlywed couple joins Chris and Lauren to give us the receipts on what really went down between Colby and Alexis, exactly why Colby and Zae got into it on guy's night, and what went into Madlyn's decision to say I do that we didn't get to see. Plus, make sure you listen through to the very end for some BONUS TEA from Rae and Shanique!

Love Is Blind fans, you're in for a treat this week! Lauren's husband Cameron drops in to dish about the show he's been bingeing lately. Then, South African rapper Nadia Nakai of Netflix’s first African reality show,Young Famous & African, joins Chris and Lauren to give us the inside scoop on the African music and fashion scenes... and of course all the drama that went down both on and off camera. If you're into Bling Empire, Selling Sunset, or Real Housewives, you're going to love this glitzy reality series aka a real-life soap opera that proves that Hollywood is alive and well in Africa. 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Lauren Speed-Hamilton - https://www.instagram.com/need4lspeed/

Chris Burns - https://www.instagram.com/fatcarriebradshaw/
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

items.content:
Aussie reality series Byron Baes arrived March 9th on Netflix. The Australian beach town of Byron Bay is a creative hot spot, full of promise — and so much drama. Cast member and influencer Jade Kevin Foster joins Chris and Lauren to give us the tea on what went down behind the scenes and shares why he's got Kim Kardashian to thank for his overnight shot to fame. Find out if you've got what it takes to be cast on your favorite Netflix reality show from someone who turned his own dreams into reality... a reality show, obvi!  

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

items.content:
Love Is Blind fan-favorite couple Iyanna McNeely and Jarrette Jones join Chris and Lauren  to share tons of behind-the-scenes gossip and never-before-heard stories! Iyanna spills that Jarrette wasn’t the only one on her list. The couple dishes on the reunion, Shake, and the Jarrette/Mallory in-person conversation. Plus, hear how their relationship is going since the show wrapped. And, Lauren wants to know: as the first black couple on Love Is Blind, do they feel any pressure to represent? 

Send all of your burning questions, either as an email or selfie video to receipts@kastmedia.com. Or, leave us a voicemail at https://www.speakpipe.com/receipts. You can also slide into our DMs with your questions!

Lauren Speed-Hamilton - https://www.instagram.com/need4lspeed/

Deepti gives us the deep-tea on her relationship with Kyle and Natalie talks about giving things another try with Shayne sans cameras.

items.title: Love Is Blind Season 2 and Series Premiere

items.content:
There’s no shame admitting that we’ve all been there… on two feet as the credits roll, wide eyed, furiously googling your new favorite stars' Instagrams, scanning Twitter for memes. You know THAT energy? That electricity you feel when the binge is done but you just want MORE? That very feeling is the central theme of Netflix & Tudum’s next breakout hit: We Have The Receipts.

Hosted by Chris Burns and Lauren Speed-Hamilton, We Have the Receipts is a weeklyall-access deep dive into Netflix Unscripted Reality! Joining Chris and Lauren will be this week’s top trending guest(s) - maybe a talked-about player from Love is Blind Season 2 or even some fan-faves from Too Hot To Handle. Must-see-TV is taken to the next level through prompts, games, conversations, segments, and immersive audience engagement that foster unpredictable moments and shocking reveals. With the free-flowing depth of podcast conversations and viral elements of TV’s best talk shows, We Have The Receipts is an upbeat, fan-first destination to uncover more insider secrets, more expert hot takes, and more off-the-rails drama from their favorite Netflix reality stars.
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
